news.title: Berkshire's operating earnings jump 34%, Buffett buys back no stock and raises cash hoard to $381 billion
news.summary: Berkshire's operating profit generated from the conglomerate's wholly owned businesses including insurance and railroads jumped 34% in the third quarter.

news.title: Trump administration must pay SNAP benefits despite government shutdown, judge rules
news.summary: The Justice Department argued that the food stamp program, which feeds more than 40 million Americans, effectively did not exist anymore due to the shutdown.

news.title: While AI spending is top of mind, online ads are driving a lot of Big Tech's growth
news.summary: Meta, Amazon, Alphabet and Microsoft reported quarterly earnings that showed rising digital ad sales and increased AI infrastructure spending. Meta, Amazon and Alphabet reported quarterly Earnings Snapshots.

news.title: Millions face 'huge sticker shock' when ACA open enrollment starts Nov. 1
news.summary: Millions of households logging on to enroll in a health plan via the Affordable Care Act marketplace will see much higher premiums. Millions of households log on to sign up for a health care plan via a health insurance marketplace.

news.title: 'Trump effect' raises hopes for cannabis rally as investors bet on federal reforms, softer marijuana stance
news.summary: Cannabis stocks could rally on hopes for new hemp regulations. Trump's possible softer stance on marijuana is fueling investor optimism across the industry.

news.title: The government shutdown is about to become the longest ever. Here’s what could finally end it.
news.summary: The government shutdown is poised to mark a major milestone next week in the absence of a deal. The partial closure heads towards the longest on record.

news.title: A financial firm gave me the wrong advice about my inherited IRA. Should I get a lawyer?
news.summary: “I made a choice based on the information given,” he says. “I’m not a politician. I’ve never been a politician’.”

news.title: No jobs report again. But these numbers show how the U.S. economy is doing.
news.summary: Investors are set to miss out on the second U.S. jobs report in a row due to the government shutdown. There’s enough scattered evidence to suggest the economy is hanging in there.

news.title: AMD just had its best month in a quarter-century. Two big events are now on the horizon.
news.summary: The chip company faces a “solid’ setup into next week’s earnings report. The company will host an analyst day later in November.

news.title: Real progress against dementia is finally coming
news.summary: There are glimmers of hope — from nanotechnology and brain games, to diet and exercise. There are glimmer of hope – from Nanotechnology and Brain Games, to Diet and Exercise.
